data.title: Baby Lock - Baby Lock Sewing Machines
data.meta_description: Explore Baby Lock: where sewing meets innovation. Dive into reliable machines, free projects, and join our supportive community. Elevate your crafting journey.
data.text:
Summer Savings

Kick off your summer with savings on our machines! Enjoy discounts on a variety of machines for sewing, quilting, serging, and embroidery!

4th Of July Sale

Celebrate Independence Day with our exclusive 4th of July Sale on Accessories and Apparel! Shop now and enjoy special discounts on a wide range of stylish items perfect for showing off your love of sewing. Don't miss out on these incredible deals!

BABY LOCK SEWING

Starting from a single stitch through endless hours of continuous operation, Baby Lock is proud to offer the finest Sewing machines in the market. All backed with unparalleled support from reputable independent retailers across the country.

New Top-of-the-Line Machine

Baby Lock is introducing something new that you don’t want to miss! Be on the lookout for sneak peeks of the latest innovation coming your way.

Something New is Coming

Discover Baby Lock's latest innovation! Get a sneak peek into the future of sewing with our newest product.

BABY LOCK SEWING

Starting from a single stitch through endless hours of continuous operation, Baby Lock is proud to offer the finest Sewing machines in the market. All backed with unparalleled support from reputable independent retailers across the country.

SEWED + Subscription

Unlock the full potential of your machine through the library of content that can only be found on SEWED, everything from covering the basics of your machine through mastering new skills in quilting techniques, embroidery, serging, software, and accessories.

New 55th Anniversary Serger

Celebrate with us and learn about our New Anniversary Limited Edition Serger! Try a new serger project with our free instructions, learn a new serging technique as you watch one of our SEWED classes, or even purchase a new serger!

New Top-of-the-Line Machine

Baby Lock is introducing something new that you don’t want to miss! Be on the lookout for sneak peeks of the latest innovation coming your way.

BABY LOCK SEWING

Starting from a single stitch through endless hours of continuous operation, Baby Lock is proud to offer the finest Sewing machines in the market. All backed with unparalleled support from reputable independent retailers across the country.

SEWED 2024 GETAWAYS

Join Baby Lock at our Educational Consumer Getaways & Adventures! Spend time with our world-class educators, mastering your skills and building confidence.

FREE PROJECTS & PATTERNS

Find projects to hep you get inspired and get the most out of your Baby Lock machines and accessories. Our expert team of educators and ambassadors love to see success in others and are adding new projects each season!

SEWED 2023 GETAWAYS

Join Baby Lock at our Educational Consumer Getaways & Adventures! Spend time with our world-class educators, mastering your skills and building confidence.

Whether you're just starting out or rekindling your love for sewing, we welcome you to the maker community.

Choose from any of our 1000+ video classes and shorts taught by over 35 Baby Lock experts that cover more than 180 Baby Lock products with more videos added regularly.
